body_html:
Just a note for others having this problem:

If you're inside a conda/virtualenv, make sure that your global python/conda installation doesn't have an older version inside. Deleting it promptly made keras/tensorflow work correctly in my case.

For windows you can find the "global" packages in
%APPDATA%\..\Local\Continuum\Anaconda\Lib\site-packages

body:
Just a note for others having this problem:

If you're inside a conda/virtualenv, make sure that your global python/conda installation doesn't have an older version inside. Deleting it promptly made keras/tensorflow work correctly in my case.

For windows you can find the "global" packages in
`%APPDATA%\..\Local\Continuum\Anaconda\Lib\site-packages`
